1370: Folkero was born in Cingel in 1370.
Got married to Jute at age 33 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Jute, Ricmoden, at age 33.
1382: Lost his wife Jute while she was giving birth to Rolekine in 1382.
1371: Had a son with Jute, Anselmi, at age 34.
Lost daughter Ricmoden when Ricmoden was 2 years old.
1372: Had a son with Jute, Kolekinus, at age 35.
1373: Had a daughter with Jute, Lisebette, at age 36.
1376: Had a son with Jute, Gheuardus, at age 39.
1379: Had a son with Jute, Lotijn, at age 42.
1381: Lost daughter Badeloghen when Badeloghen was 0 years old.
Jute gave birth to their stillborn daughter Badeloghen in 1381.
Lost son Lotijn when Lotijn was 3 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
